parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag sensor can cause the airbag to malfunction or not deploy in the event of an accident, which can lead to serious injury or death.
symptoms: the passenger airbag sensor is faulty
the airbag system turns off when a pillow or cushion is used in the front passenger seat.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in repairing the airbag sensor recall can lead to a prolonged period of risk for occupants, as the airbag may not deploy properly in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The part to repair the airbag sensor recall is not available
the dealer is unable to perform the repair
the manufacturer has exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The airbag system design may not be adequate for certain situations, such as when an adult uses a pillow or cushion in the front passenger seat, which can lead to the airbag turning off and leaving the occupant unprotected.
symptoms: The airbag system turns off when a pillow or cushion is used in the front passenger seat
the airbag system is not designed to accommodate adult occupants with medical needs.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Hose/Line Failure Due to Rubbing Against Suspension Components
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rubbing of the brake hose/line against the suspension components can cause the hose/line to rupture, leading to complete brake failure, which can result in accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Visible wear on the brake hose/line

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective windshield wipers can impair the driver's visibility, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, especially during heavy rain or snow.
symptoms: The windshield wipers do not clear the windows properly
leaving streaks or residue on the windshield.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected shattering of the panoramic sunroof can cause injuries from flying glass shards, distract the driver, and lead to accidents.
symptoms: The panoramic sunroof explodes or shatters without any apparent cause
resulting in thousands of glass shards falling onto the windshield and interior of the vehicle.
